entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Cold Lake 06:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
